== Me ==
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="font: normal 1.1em Georgia, serif; font-size: 14pt !important; background:#F8FFCF; margin: 0 0 1em 1em;" style="padding:0.5em;">Hello, my name is Alexander.
|-
| Nickname is ''Mortiy'' (which is <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BGN/PCGN_romanization_of_Russian|PCGN]]</nowiki> transliteration of cyrillic ''Мортий'' (which phonetically sounds as Mortiĭ). This nick appeared 6 years ago as name for game character by variation of word ''mortal''.
|-
| I'm ~22 years Ukrainian guy. Currently studying at Electronics faculty of <nowiki>[[http://www.nau.edu.ua/en/Main/|NAU]]</nowiki> university and at same time working as web oriented developer coding on Perl, PHP and JavaScript.
|-
| I also have some knowledge of C++ and Java, but without professional experience.
|}
